description: Retrieve a thread of messages posted to a conversation
name: conversations.replies

channel.description: Conversation ID to fetch thread from.

cursor.description: Paginate through collections of data by setting the `cursor` parameter to a `next_cursor` attribute returned by a previous request's `response_metadata`. Default value fetches the first "page" of the collection. See [pagination](/docs/pagination) for more detail.

inclusive.description: Include messages with latest or oldest timestamp in results only when either timestamp is specified.

latest.description: End of time range of messages to include in results.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. Fewer than the requested number of items may be returned, even if the end of the users list hasn't been reached.

oldest.description: Start of time range of messages to include in results.

ts.description: Unique identifier of a thread's parent message.
